title: 新人报道
author: Liao_Mei_master
txt_content: 大家好，我是新来的，请多关照

replies.author: Liao_Mei_master
replies.txt_content: 其实并不是新人，只是大号违规被封了

replies.txt_content: 欢迎新人啦阿拉啦啦啦

replies.txt_content:
新人你好！
